title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. B, ch. I, subch. E, pt. 80 - Representation By Attorney
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. B, ch. I, subch. E, pt. 80 - Representation By Attorney

State Regulations
§ 80.1 - Representation by counsel permitted
§ 80.2 - Attorney of record
§ 80.3 - Successor attorney
§ 80.4 - Place of filing notices
§ 80.5 - Separate notices to be filed in each proceeding
§ 80.6 - Service upon attorney of record

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. B, ch. I, subch. E, pt. 80

Statutory authority: Executive Law, §168

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
